Summary An insurance professional with 25 years of Management and Technical experience spread across Indian insurance and IT industries. Deep insurance domain knowledge of functional areas such as claims, underwriting, operations, account management and distribution gained during my 19 year stint in the Indian insurance industry. Exposure to global insurance practices and expertise in commercial risk management, P&C Commercial lines and Employee Benefit Lines of insurance in 4+ years in IBM Treasury and 2+ Years in IBM, GBS. Adept at applying knowledge of insurance domain and identifying exposures in various areas of operations and to find solutions for business issues. 
 
Worked on Genisys , IDIT and GuideWire PolicyCenter Applications. Certified in PolicyCenter v7.0 Functional and trained in GW BillingCenter. Working on GuideWire PolicyCenter for the last one year. Summary Partha is a Senior Functional Consultant with 9 years’ experience in IT consulting and 4 years’ experience in Industry. LOMA and III Certified 
 
His Core Competencies:  
1. Requirement Management,  
2. Client Interaction and Relationship,  
3. Product Modelling,  
4. Functional Architecture,  
5. Solution Design, 
6. Solution Assessment and Validation, 
6. Agile Practices 
7. Market Research 
8. Document Management.  
9. Financial Planning 
10. BA CoE 
11. Insurance Offerings 
12. Authoring Articles and PoV 
 
- Qualitative experience in Business Analysis, Requirement gathering, Business Rule Harvesting, Workflow Management and Testing Procedures 
- Excellent knowledge over Pension/Annuity and Insurance Products, Processes with sound understanding of Group Insurance 
- Adept on market research in Pension and Life Insurance industry and capturing larger trends 
- Thorough understanding of Asset Management Industry  
- Experience in multiple Insurance IT platorms: IIMS i.e. TCS BaNCS (TCS), Core-Elixir (Mastek), LIS (Tieto), Guidewire PolicyCenter, SAP FS-PRO 
- Exposure to different Geographies: Australia, Europe, USA, Middle East and India. 
- Strong experience in Product Modelling with independent responsibility in Product Modelling Group (PMG). 
- Well versed with BABOK Guide of IIBA and Mentoring of Budding BAs. 
- MBA (Finance) with Cross Functional Exposure in Life Insurance and Pensions, Capital Market, Corporate Finance domain.  
 
Interested in business consulting, high-end functional architecture, larger trend in insurance and pension market, requirement navigation from elicitation till acceptance.
